title: Economic Impact Analysis of Cloud Computing: A Structural Modeling Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics and data analysis concepts, familiarity with fundamental cloud computing terminology
context.additional_context: Conducting a project analyzing real-world corporate cases through the use of smartphone-based learning tools

learning_goals: They can design a structural equation model (SEM) explaining the economic effects of cloud computing and complementary technologies (big data/ML).
Participants can write an analytical report quantifying direct and indirect effects on corporate performance metrics.
Participants can submit a project outcome (approximately 10 pages) comparing technology adoption strategies between small and large enterprises.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
